Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class TerrainTile

TerrainTile represents a Terrain gameobject in the scene. This class handles the instantiation of Terrain, noise application, position, and texture application.

| Improve this Doc View Source

CreateMesh(Vector2, Boolean)

Creates a Mesh with the length and resolution specified in TerraSettings. Applies the passed heights from calculated noise values.

  • Cannot be called off of the main thread
  • Does not generate a MeshCollider, call 
    GenerateCollider
    instead.

Declaration
public void CreateMesh(Vector2 position, bool renderOnCreation = true)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector2 position

Position to place Mesh in the tile grid
System.Boolean renderOnCreation
| Improve this Doc View Source

GenerateCollider()

Generates and applies new MeshCollider for the tile if no collider exists currently or 

IsColliderDirty
is true.

Declaration
public void GenerateCollider()
